target.name: publish
target.description: compile, jar and publish all projects in the right order to the SHARED repository

target.name: publish-local
target.description: compile, jar and publish all projects in the right order to the LOCAL repository

target.name: usage
target.echo: "build" - Invokes the 'build' target on each build file in the project tree
"publish" - compile, jar and publish all projects in the right order to the SHARED repository
"publish-local" - compile, jar and publish all projects in the right order to the LOCAL repository
"clean-all" - calls the "clean-build" and "clean-lib" targets to clean the dependencies and builds for all projects
"clean-build" - clean the built project file directories
"clean-local" - cleans the local repository for the current module
"uberclean" - delete the ivy local repository, ivy cache, and project build
